title: Love River Warrior, Akihiko

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Attack a player.
-Attack a player. You may choose to do any of the following to the attacked player, but you may choose no more than 1 additional effect:
> Clean them.
> Disguise their cause of death to be any other role.
> Make them appear to be alive for a day. They will appear as dead the day after.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You may not multitask.
-At the end of each Full Moon, you will call an Ally to help you and you will leave the battlefield. Practically, that means your role will change into **Love River Hero, Airi**, if it hasnt already.

desc:
Post 1573B
*I made this armour myself! It's pretty, right?*
